Selected work

Senior staff product designer (full-time) 2022 2023

Voicemod is a B2C MacOS and Windows real-time voice changing app.

Discover how I successfully reduced the app's uninstall rate by revamping the onboarding experience and conducting user testing with individuals who encountered difficulties during setup.

Senior UX designer (full-time) 2021 2022

Ennely app was a B2C MacOS video editor assistant that enabled content creators to create a first cut within minutes.

Find out how a unique app with no pre-established rules came to life and how along with a small team I created magic.

View project

Senior designer (full-time) 2019 2020 2021

Power Automate desktop is a B2B Windows app that saves its users time from doing repetitive tasks on their computers.

FJoin me in the world of desktop automation and let's explore how an app created by a small company, became part of Windows 11.

About me

Hello! I'm Vasilis Kolip, a product designer who likes to wear colourful sneakers.

I'm a half-Greek and half-Turkish citizen of the world who has lived and worked in Amsterdam, Birmingham and Istanbul.

I've got an academic background in animation and interactive media as well as artificial intelligence and computer science.

What sets me apart is my extensive product design and user research experience on a vast array of successful projects with diverse cross-functional teams.

View profileConnect on LinkedIn

Questions I'm asked

I have an academic background in design and computer science and have worked in the UI/UX industry for the past 10 years.

In all my roles I've designed successful products that have received industry recognition and are being used by millions of people

I have a curated list of blogs and online communities which I follow and learn things from. I also attend design conferences whenever I can and I'm also a member of a local design community.

I try to stay up-to-date with the latest trends by regularly watchin YouTube video so I can incorporate them in my designs and push the limit further.

Figma, Sketch, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere, After Effects, InDesign, Lookback, Calendly, MS Office, GSuite and anything else that might be needed.

In a company, I am looking for a supportive and inclusive culture that values collaboration, creativity, and personal growth.

I seek an environment that encourages open communication, where ideas are valued and diverse perspectives are embraced.

It is important to me to be part of a company that prioritizes user-centric design, innovation and the pursuit of excellence. I also value opportunities for professional development, a strong sense of purpose and the chance to work on meaningful projects that make a positive impact.

I believe in fostering strong collaboration with cross-functional teams by maintaining open lines of communication, actively listening to different perspectives, and valuing the expertise and insights each team member brings.

By establishing a shared understanding of project goals and requirements, I ensure that design decisions align with both user needs and technical feasibility.

Regular meetings, workshops, and design reviews are key to fostering a collaborative environment where ideas can be openly discussed, refined, and implemented effectively.
